attributes.action: Child games with chat rooms to be banned from free downloads, stop paedophiles!
attributes.background: Please stop any games aimed at children with online chat available to download for free. These games are dangerous and easily abused by pedophiles they must be stopped!!!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for banning websites or games, many of which may not be based in the UK. You could start on a petition calling on the Government to request that Internet Service Providers block access to such games.
